name: Tether (itch) (Newbie Indie Game Dev)
description:
Aim all RED LASERS to the core to win a level.

Click MAGENTA BUTTONS to turn a square clockwise.

Click CYAN BUTTONS to turn a square counter clockwise.

GREEN LASERS link square rotations.

YELLOW LASERS double the target square rotation speed.

MAGENTA LASERS disable turning a square clockwise.

CYAN LASERS disable turning a square counter clockwise.

ORANGE LASERS disable red lasers.

The game was developed for GMTK Game Jam 2021 under the theme "Joined Together" in 2 days.
